thread.title: Flyers G Neuvirth stops 30 shots in 3-0 win over Chicago
thread.title_full: Flyers G Neuvirth stops 30 shots in 3-0 win over Chicago

author: wtopstaff
title: Flyers G Neuvirth stops 30 shots in 3-0 win over Chicago
text:
Home » News » Sports » NHL » Flyers G Neuvirth stops… Flyers G Neuvirth stops 30 shots in 3-0 win over Chicago By DAN GELSTON October 14, 2015 10:46 pm Philadelphia Flyers left wing Michael Raffl, center, of Austria tries to wrap the puck around the goal with Chicago Blackhawks goalie Corey Crawford, right, making the save, as center Andrew Desjardins, left, trails Raffl during the second period of a hockey game, Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, in Philadelphia. (AP Photo/Chris Szagola) 
PHILADELPHIA (AP) — Michal Neuvirth stopped 30 shots in his second straight shutout, leading the Philadelphia Flyers to a 3-0 win over the Chicago Blackhawks on Wednesday night. 
Sam Gagner, Claude Giroux and Matt Read scored to lead the Flyers to their 12th straight regular-season home victory over Chicago. The Flyers have not lost to the Blackhawks in Philly during the regular season since Nov. 9, 1996. 
The Blackhawks beat the Flyers in the 2010 Stanley Cup Final and clinched with a Game 6 win in Philly. 
Filling in for Steve Mason, Neuvirth was sensational in his ninth career shutout. Mason missed a second straight game because of unspecified family reasons and there was no word when he would return. Topics:
